subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Jan Hudec of Canada won the first downhill of the World Cup season before a home crowd in Lake Louise, Alberta. Hudec, coming back from three knee operations, finished ahead of Marco Sullivan of the United States.At Panorama, British Columbia, Denise Karbon of Italy won her second straight World Cup giant slalom.
